column4: is there a way to sniff if a file gets deleted and replace it with another file?
inotify, dnotify etc are the things in the kernel for that
or just script to check every 5 seconds is the opposite end of the scale
colony2 is out, and xorg is back to normal, so this is probably as good a time as any
